Posts.Content: Yes have spoken to dr. And unfortunately these are side effects So just wanted to see if anyone had any remedies to deal with it
Posts.Title: Aremedix

Posts.Content: My cancer was estrogen fed so dr. Put me on Aremedix I find the worst thing is stiffness in joints and pain in bones. Anyone else experience this and if so do you have any suggestions as to how to deal with this Also very tired and mood swings very often Forgot to say I had breast cancer and had one Breast removed
Posts.Title: Aremedix
